abstract: Addition of Boise State is a key for the Big East Conference to retain its automatic qualifying bid in the Bowl Championship Series.
snippet: The addition of Boise State is a key for the Big East Conference to retain its automatic qualifying bid in the Bowl Championship Series.
lead_paragraph: The addition of Boise State is a key for the Big East Conference to retain its automatic qualifying bid in the Bowl Championship Series.

headline.main: Big East Planning to Add Six to Make 12
headline.print_headline: Big East Planning To Add Six To Make 12
